1496860294119051265.text: Leaders of the free world must awaken to the challenges that come with the return of great power conflict and a multipolar world.

1496860292541734917.text: We should immediately impose the strongest possible economic sanctions to make Putin a global outcast. We must cut off Russia from SWIFT and freeze the life of luxury enjoyed by Putin and his oligarchs.

1496860291568738308.text: In the face of Russian aggression in Ukraine, the United States must be united and resolute. Sanctions announced earlier this week by @POTUS are a positive step, as are ongoing efforts to rally our NATO allies.

1496860290650193924.text: American strength and leadership in this moment is critical. The weak response from the United States following Russia’s previous invasions of Georgia and Crimea left Putin undeterred in his perverse ambition of rebuilding the Soviet Union.

1496860289349918721.text: Vladimir Putin is attacking the democratic, rules-based order that has benefitted countless Americans & millions around the globe since WW II. The US must stand with the Ukrainian people by immediately providing additional assistance, including military equipment and lethal aid.

1294635203739234304.text: Today, on the 75th anniversary of VJ Day, we salute them all, and remember with gratitude the victory they earned and the freedoms they defended.

1294635202749308928.text: From the Atlantic to the Pacific, our soldiers, sailors and airmen risked all for the cause of human liberty. And across the state and nation, industries and individuals alike did their part as well.

1294635201595940864.text: The August 15, 1945 special addition of the Indianapolis Star declared “PEACE!” That peace had been won by the heroism of America’s military and the strength of its citizens.

1294635200631185408.text: Sacrifices were made at home too, where household goods, food, and gasoline were all rationed. Hoosiers communities endured these shortages and eagerly collected rubber, tin, paper and other materials to aid the war effort.

1294635199721070592.text: The celebration was well-deserved for soldier and citizen alike. Four trying years had passed since America joined the fight to defeat totalitarianism. Over 400,000 of its citizens died for that cause – nearly 12,000 of them Hoosiers.

1294635198030778371.text: In Indianapolis, men and women in uniform filed up Meridian Street, while thousands of citizens packed Monument Circle, some even wading into the fountains of the Soldiers and Sailors Monument. Nearby giant Vs – for victory – emblazed the front of L.S. Ayers and Company.

1294635197078659073.text: WWII concluded 75 years ago today with the surrender of Japan. Like other Americans, when Hoosiers heard the news they formed parades & marched up their streets. They gathered in their town’s centers to celebrate & cry. They draped bunting & hung flags from businesses and homes.

1271196331625848835.text: Spoke about the need to pass my #EndlessFrontierAct on the Senate floor today. This bipartisan legislation will propel innovation and position American lead. Watch an excerpt from my speech below. https://t.co/ZOdCxOCzC8 https://t.co/U1mkn8n1jI

1271126149662416902.text: The #EndlessFrontierAct will provide rocket fuel for America’s innovators and visionaries. Let us resolve here today to pass it so that this generation of innovators and their children can propel us forward and win the 21st century.

1271125731108687872.text: To meet these new challenges, we must once again show the entire world the resiliency and dynamism of the American people, American economy, and the American project itself. And to do this, we must not simply advance again towards the Endless Frontier, but accelerate into it.

1271124214670557188.text: We are not in a 20th Century cold war. But we can learn and apply lessons from the Cold War. Just as we did in the 20th Century, we must not simply contain a competitor but instead out-innovate and out-grow them.

1271124064900468736.text: These are important and must remain in place. But if America is to lead the world in the 21st century, it is neither realistic nor practical to build an economic iron curtain around China.

1271123964627161088.text: Until now, we have primarily focused on defensive countermeasures to thwart aggression by the Chinese Communist Party: blocking Huawei, tightening export controls, and improving foreign investment rules.

1271123336186277893.text: The #EndlessFrontierAct will deliver $10 billion to establish regional tech hubs across the country to launch innovative companies, revive American manufacturing, and create new jobs to jumpstart our local communities.

1271122655295537152.text: The #EndlessFrontierAct will solidify America’s leadership in scientific and technological innovation & combat China through increased investment in emerging technologies. It will also transform the National Science Foundation into the National Science and Technology Foundation.

1265691178126782465.text: As America emerges from the #coronavirus crisis, we must not be content with merely recovering our losses. Instead, we must position ourselves to lead. The #EndlessFrontierAct is the way to do it.

1265691177053040641.text: America’s history is filled with bold initiatives and calculated investments that have harnessed America’s ability to collaborate across the public and private sectors. @Elonmusk and @SpaceX’s historic launch today is a prime example.

1265691176025415680.text: The spread of #coronavirus around the world has heightened the public’s awareness of the deep connections and serious vulnerabilities that shape our lives. Now is the time for America to invest in ourselves and give the world a clear alternative.

1265691174897102855.text: By virtue of being the first to emerge on the other side of the #coronavirus pandemic, the Chinese Communist Party is working hard to use the crisis to its advantage by extending influence over the global economy.

1265691173483577345.text: China & others are stealing American intellectual property & aggressively working to dominate the known technology fields of the future. Without a significant increase in U.S. innovation, global competitors will overtake our technological primacy.

1265691172346966017.text: Working with @SenSchumer, and Representatives @RepGallagher and @RoKhanna, the #EndlessFrontierAct was crafted to ensure America is leading in scientific and technological innovation through increased investments in the technology fields of the future.

1265691171139006466.text: Today, I officially unveiled my new bipartisan, bicameral legislation – the #EndlessFrontierAct – to bolster U.S. tech leadership and combat China: https://t.co/vSEx1yQbKF

1215739381480402945.text: @POTUS There is no question our nation is safer today now that Soleimani is dead and I commend @POTUS for taking decisive action.

1215738433534152704.text: Thankfully, rather than give Iran the ability to continue its destabilizing activities, we have a @POTUS who acted to protect our service members and to project peace through strength.

1215738432049307648.text: Soleimani provided critical support for terror groups across the world including Hezbollah, the Taliban, Hamas, and Palestinian Islamic Jihad. Former Secretary Mattis said “Everywhere you find turmoil in the Middle East, you find Iran’s hand in it.”

1215738154856206336.text: Soleimani was a terrorist mastermind responsible for killing hundreds of Americans & thousands of Iraqis, Syrians, Yemenis and others. He provided support for the barbaric Assad regime in Syria, facilitating human rights atrocities & ethnic cleansing of thousands of Sunnis.

1215738153283260417.text: Then we witnessed the attack on our U.S. embassy in Baghdad. Once again, @POTUS responded not with empty rhetoric but with action and ordered a strike to kill Qasem Soleimani.

1215738151597236225.text: @POTUS Unfortunately, rather than change its behavior, Iran has instead inflamed tensions further by sabotaging oil tankers in the Gulf, downing a U.S. Navy drone, holding a British-flagged tanker hostage, targeting Iraqi military bases, and killing an American.

1215737835887779843.text: .@POTUS’ maximum pressure campaign on Iran has always been aimed at fixing the glaring gaps in the Obama nuclear deal and denying Iran the resources to support terror groups from Yemen to Syria and Lebanon.

1215737834323226626.text: In 2018, @POTUS made the right decision to change course and withdraw from the Obama nuclear deal. Instead of starting with cash, @POTUS started with pressure.

1215737832817426433.text: This flawed nuclear deal turned a blind eye toward Iran’s destabilizing activities across the region while establishing a legal pathway, the economic resources, and the international community to protect Iran’s nuclear future.

1215737830883893254.text: President Obama’s Iran nuclear deal gave Iran two big concessions: economic sanctions relief and an international blessing for its nuclear program.

1215724135097282560.text: Russia & China must not again veto the @UN resolution to maintain cross border humanitarian assistance in Syria. Over 3M people rely on cross border aid for food and life-saving medicine that will come to a halt at midnight unless the UN Security Council can come to an agreement.
